title: Info Overload: A Cooperative Evacuation Game
authors:
MJ Johns, Rita Tesfay, M\'ario Escarce Junior, Emmanuel Ezenwa Jr.,
  Thomas Maiorana, Magy Seif El-Nasr, Edward Melcer, Katherine Isbister
abstract:
Info Overload is a minigame within a larger collection aimed at increasing
awareness and preparation for an evacuation in the event of a wildfire. The
game relies on experiential two-player cooperative gameplay and is played on a
mobile device (a phone or tablet).
subjects: Computing Research Repository/Computer Science and Game Theory
